properties.entry: Parameters of the .neu files. The indentation follows the branch structure of the data tree. Folders are in bold font, sheets, where values can be changed are in normal font. Default values (taken from experimental findings described in the literature) are in ■ lists.
Initial segment follows the axonal hillock.
Base angle between two branches at a branching point in degree.
Contains parameters to control the deviation from the base neuron; i.e. the appearance of the realization of this neuron.
Geometric length vector in multiples of the soma radius...
Subsequent generations of the neural tree and their parameters.
Total number of primary dendrites (basal and apical).
Contains settings for the dendritic tree.
Start value for the random number generator.
Parameters for the distribution of input synapses.
distance of location of synapse to soma in μm
First generation of the neural tree.
Base angle at the branching points in degree.
